snippet: The moderators of the second presidential encounter pressed for specifics, asserted facts and responded to criticism from Donald J. Trump in real time....
abstract: Anderson Cooper of CNN and Martha Raddatz of ABC News, moderators at second presidential debate between Hillary Clinton and Donald J Trump, shoot blunt, provocative questions at both candidates during town hall-style forum; many journalists praise news veterans for their control over event, demand for specifics from candidates and assertion of facts in real time.
lead_paragraph: The moderators of the second presidential encounter pressed for specifics, asserted facts and responded to criticism from Donald J. Trump in real time.

headline.print_headline: Journalists’ Sharp Questions This Second Encounter
headline.main: Martha Raddatz and Anderson Cooper Steered Debate With Sharp Questions
